sentences.sentence: He combined the repertory of the birds with the repertory of the workshops.
sentences.translation: 他把鸣禽的节目和车间的节目组合起来。

sentences.sentence: 'he adored his son,' said Lorraine Foat, an actress from Spencer's days in repertory theatre.
sentences.translation: “他宠爱儿子，”斯潘塞在剧目剧院认识的女演员罗琳•法特说。

sentences.sentence: Although Arthur Rubinstein played some of this repertory, few other pianists outside Spain did, and none with Ms. DE Larrocha's flair.
sentences.translation: 虽然Arthur Rubinstein也表演了其中的一些曲目，除此很少有人能逾越西班牙的钢琴家，更无人匹敌德拉·罗查女士的才华。
